name: Iowa Flight Training
about: Iowa Flight Training, located at the Eastern Iowa Airport (KCID) in Cedar Rapids and the Waverly Municipal Airport (C25), is dedicated to providing high-quality ground and flight training to grow General Aviation. Our fleet includes a Piper Cherokee 140, Piper Warrior II, Piper Archer II, and Piper Arrow, all equipped with Garmin GNS-430W and ADSB. We offer flight training, flight reviews, aircraft rental, ground school classes, and a pilot supply store. Founded by Tim Busch, a Master Certified Flight Instructor and FAA Safety Counselor, our team of experienced instructors is committed to helping you achieve your aviation goals. With a structured approach and well-maintained aircraft, we ensure a safe and effective learning environment. Financing is available, and you set the pace. We are ready to help you meet your aviation aspirations.
